attributes.action: Stop all Plans for car Sharing lanes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is yet another hair brained Scheme thought off in a Split Second by a dying government which is both incompetent and arrogant. There has been no thought put into this proposal at all. for Starters how about shift workers how can they possibly Share when they work all various times?  Not to mention the vulnerable position it would force woman into and the congestion it will cause. All motorist already pay huge taxes for fuel and car tax among other things. Yet we can't use bus lanes and now we are getting another lane Stolen from us when all we are trying to do is go to work and for what, to pay more tax!
